mapper.sql: r.id, r.is_valid, r.room_id, r.room_area_id, r._row, r._column, r.name, r.asset_id, r.tid, r._width, r._height, r._capacity, r.remark, r.org_id, r.region_id, r.created_time, r.updated_time
mapper.insert: insert into rack ( id, room_id, room_area_id, _row, _column, name, asset_id, tid, _width, _height, _capacity, remark, org_id, region_id ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{roomId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roomAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{row,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{column,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{width,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{height,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{capacity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regionId,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update:
update rack set
is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
room_id = #{roomId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
room_area_id = #{roomAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
_row = #{row,jdbcType=INTEGER},
_column = #{column,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
asset_id = #{assetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tid = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
_width = #{width,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
_height = #{height,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
_capacity = #{capacity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
region_id = #{regionId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from rack r where is_del = '0'

select ,so.name as orgName,ro.name as roomName from rack r LEFT JOIN (select * from sys_org soz where soz.is_del = 0) so on r.org_id = so.id LEFT JOIN (select * from room roz where roz.is_del = 0) ro on r.room_id = ro.id
and r.id = #{data.id} and r.room_id = #{data.roomId} and r.name like concat('%',#{data.name},'%')
and so.full_code like concat('',#{fullCode},'%')
and r.is_del = '0'
